title: Toyota Aurion font?
content:
Does anyone know what the font is used on the side of the Toyota Aurion? Here’s a picture:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411232613im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/aurion_4427.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Looking for scripts similar to Eye Magazine logo - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411232613/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32776 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID please ... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411232613/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32798 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Power4

comments.content:
Most auto badges are custom. But a thickened version of Runway, from House Industries, would be rather close:

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=143&subpage=viewfonts...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080411232613/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=143&subpage=viewfontspecimens "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=143&subpage=viewfontspecimens")

That “URIO” looks a lot like Eurostile. You could build the ’A’ and ’N’ out of upside-down ’U’s.

- Lex
